questions.question: What are your opening hours?
questions.answer: We are open from 5pm till midnight Monday to Thursday, and from midday till late on weekends and public holidays!

questions.question: Do you offer vegetarian or vegan options?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a variety of vegetarian and vegan dishes available on our menu.

questions.question: Is there a dress code at your establishment?
questions.answer: We have a casual dress code. Please come dressed comfortably.

questions.question: Can I make a reservation?
questions.answer: Yes, we accept reservations. You can make a reservation by calling us or using our online reservation system.

questions.question: Do you have outdoor seating?
questions.answer: Yes, we have outdoor seating available for our customers.

questions.question: Is there parking available?
questions.answer: We have dedicated parking spaces for our customers. Parking is available on a first-come, first-served basis.

questions.question: What types of cuisine do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer a diverse range of cuisines, including Mediterranean, Middle Eastern, and fusion dishes.

questions.question: Can I bring my own alcohol?
questions.answer: We have a full-service bar, so outside alcohol is not permitted.

questions.question: Do you offer delivery or takeout services?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide both delivery and takeout services. You can place your order through our website or by calling us.

questions.question: Are you pet-friendly?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, we do not allow pets inside the establishment. However, we have outdoor seating where pets are permitted.

questions.question: Are there any age restrictions?
questions.answer: We are a family-friendly establishment. However, for certain events or during specific hours, age restrictions may apply. Please check with our staff for more information.

questions.question: Can I host private events at your venue?
questions.answer: Yes, we have event spaces available for private functions. Please contact our events team for more details and availability.

questions.question: Are you wheelchair accessible?
questions.answer: Yes, we have wheelchair-accessible entrances, ramps, and accessible seating areas.

questions.question: Do you have live entertainment or music?
questions.answer: Yes, we regularly host live entertainment and music events. Check our schedule or social media for upcoming performances.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept cash, credit cards, and mobile payment options such as Apple Pay and Google Pay.

questions.question: Can I bring my own hookah?
questions.answer: We provide hookah service at our establishment. Outside hookahs are not permitted.

questions.question: Do you have a happy hour?
questions.answer: Yes, we have happy hour specials. Our happy hour timings and offers may vary, so please check our website or contact us for more information.

questions.question: Do you accommodate dietary restrictions or food allergies?
questions.answer: We strive to accommodate dietary restrictions and food allergies. Please inform our staff about your specific requirements, and they will assist you accordingly.

questions.question: Can I book a table for a large group?
questions.answer: Yes, we can accommodate large groups. It's recommended to make a reservation in advance, especially for larger parties.

questions.question: Are you affiliated with any loyalty or rewards programs?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a loyalty program that offers exclusive benefits and rewards to our regular customers. Ask our staff for more details on how to join.
